value.0: <StartAction>[You come upon Markius Albright and his companions, apparently having cornered the Crimson Prophet here within the Docks...]<StartAction>
Your days are finished, Prophet! You shall never leave Ghaarak with that jewel! <StartAction>[Harkon begins gesturing his hands in preparation for a spell...</Start>
<StartAction>[As Harkon releases his sorceries upon the Crimson Prophet, a strange magical sphere arises around the red robed figure, stopping the spell before it can reach him...]</Start>
Did you truly think that I, the Crimson Prophet, would fall to such a pitiful display of power, fool?! No! I'm afraid it is you who shall fall this night!
<StartAction>[The Crimson Prophet utters a single word, unleashing a powerful magical blast which sends Harkon reeling to the ground...]</Start>
To me, ShadowGuard! The Crimson Prophet must not be allowed to escape!
<StartAction>[The Crimson Prophet looks upon his oncoming attackers in disinterest.]</Start> I grow tired of your meddling in my affairs, fools!
<StartAction>[You see the Crimson Prophet raise his hand in the air, calling forth a vile cloud which covers the docks and sends everyone nearby to the ground, reeling in nausea...]</Start>
Now, I believe I shall be on my way... but before I do, I shall leave you with some companions to keep you... preoccupied... while I make my escape...
Destroy these fools while I escape to my ship! Let the Sharakhan Empire cower in fear before the might of the Crimson Prophet!
<StartAction>[You find yourself unable to move as the Crimson Prophet draws near to you, his strange eyes locking with yours.]</Start> So, you have lowered the Control Stone's shields...

Quite clever of you, <lad/lass>... but it matters not! I have retrieved what I have come for... <StartAction>[The Prophet holds forth a black jewel, red flames dancing along its smooth surface...]</Start>

<StartAction>[Harkon slowly turns his head towards the Crimson Prophet, struggling against the sorceries holding him in place.]</Start> You shall not take that gem, Prophet! By Rakha's name, I swear it!
<StartAction>[The Crimson Prophet sneers.]</Start> Rakha holds no power over me, petty sorcerer! No, I believe there is little you can do to stop me...
And to ensure you bother me no further, I believe I shall leave you to my followers... <StartAction>[The Prophet motions for his followers to enter the chamber...]</Start>
Finish them, Followers of the Crimson Path! Show these fools what fate lies in store for those who stand in the way of the Crimson Prophet!
<StartAction>[As the Crimson Prophet departs, he waves his hand in a wide arc, causing the doors of the Control Stone chamber to slam shut and seal behind him...]</Start>
